p: Ceker et al. [ 63] studied the effects of SHEO against aflatoxin B1 (AFB1) in human lymphocytes in vitro. The results suggested strong antioxidative and antigenotoxic effects, expressed by the decrease of sister chromatid exchange and micronuclei, as well as malondialdehyde, superoxide dismutase and glutathione peroxidase levels, increased as a result of the AFB1 action.
